name: Alas Tres the Game
description:
A 2D Pixel Role-playing Game about the Philippine Folklore.

Story

You play as Pedro, grandson of Lolo Jose. Pedro just arrived at Pagsanhan, Samar from Manila to visit his Lolo. At the drop of three o' clock, Pedro finds himself in the realm of the mythical creatures, known as The Lost City of Biringan. Unbeknownst to him, there lies a greater responsibility ahead of him before he can finally return home.

Game Features # Philippine Folklore Creatures

Learn about some of the local folklore creatures in the Philippines featured in the game that you might face.

# Head-on Battles

Engage in face-to-face combat with evil mythical creatures and escape death as you heroically save the lost city and find your way back home.

# Item Pickups and Power-ups

Pick up, collect items and power-ups to enhance your gameplay, and significantly increase your chance of survival!

How to Play

WASD - To move.

H - To proceed/skip dialogue or interact with characters and objects.

J - To perform 'Pagi Slash' attack.

K - To dodge enemy attacks.

E - To consume a 'Leaf of Life' and heal.

U - To perform 'Asin' Attack.

I - To perform 'Bawang Attack'.

Your honest feedback would be greatly appreciated!
